The Lough is calling you home

Book Your Stay Explore Experiences

Unplug. Unwind. Uncover Lough Hyne.

Perched on the edge of Ireland's only marine nature reserve, Lough Hyne Cottage is a retreat for those who crave the extraordinary.

Here, morning swims replace alarms, starlit soaks outshine screen time and the air is thick with the scent of saltwater and sourdough. Whether you're diving into adventure or sinking into stillness, welcome to a retreat that feels like it was made just for you.

100% Sustainable

Solar-powered facilities and zero-waste operations

Wellness Focused

Holistic experiences for mind, body, and spirit

Locally Sourced

Supporting local artisans and organic farmers

Reset

Nature is the ultimate healer for body and mind

Relax

In Nature, we find clarity and perspective

Receive

Nature sparks creativity and inspiration

Realise

Nature is a gift for all to embrace and enjoy

Come stay in our cosy cabin

unplug from the everyday

At Lough Hyne Cottage, we invite you to immerse yourself in the rhythm of nature's embrace. Awaken to the melody of birdsong, inhale the fresh West Cork air and enjoy a wood-fired soak beneath a sky full of stars. Here, there's no rush, just moments to savour.

Be as active or as lazy as you like. Ensconce yourself fully in the comforts of the cottage or explore the native Irish woodland of Knockomagh and the Lough's stunning shores.

Food, Fun and a little magic through our restorative experiences

Discover wellness, creativity, and connection through our carefully curated experiences designed to rejuvenate your mind, body, and spirit.

€70

Sauna Sessions

Experience authentic sauna culture in our traditional wood-fired sauna. Relax, rejuvenate, and connect with nature in this timeless wellness practice.

Wood-fired experience Natural setting

1-2 Hours

€80

Monthly Yoga Mini-Retreats

Immerse yourself in tranquil yoga sessions surrounded by the natural beauty of Lough Hyne. Combined with hyper-local, veggie-filled meals inspired by California meets West Cork cuisine.

Peaceful natural setting All levels welcome

Full Day

€135

Wood-Fired Bread Making Workshop

Join us monthly as we fire up our traditional wood stove to create artisanal bread and pastries. Learn the ancient art of sourdough baking while connecting with our local community.

Sourdough starter to take home Wood-fired oven baking

11 am - 5pm
